Label & Badges

Labels & Badges are useful to highlight content, use as tags for content type, and more. For example, you can attach a label that notes when something was updated.

Default Label    7

Label

Badge

1 2 3 A B C
1 2 3 A B C

Sass Mixins

Use these mixins to create custom labels and badges.

.custom-label { @extend %label; @include label-layout( $fontsize: 1rem, $padding: 0.25em ); @include label-style( $background: red, $color: #fff, $radius: 20px ); } .custom-badge { @extend %badge; @include badge-layout( $fontsize: 1rem, $padding: 0.25em ); @include badge-style( $background: red, $color: #fff, $radius: 1000px ); }
